-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | (deprecated)
--   
--   This package has been deprecated. You recommend that you use either
--   <tt>attoparsec-enumerator</tt> or <tt>attoparsec-conduit</tt>
--   packages.
@package attoparsec-text-enumerator
@version 0.2.0.1


-- | Convert an attoparsec-text parser into an iteratee. This package is
--   heavily based on attoparsec-enumerator for the original attoparsec on
--   <tt>ByteString</tt>.
module Data.Attoparsec.Text.Enumerator

-- | The context and message from a <a>Fail</a> value.
data ParseError
ParseError :: [String] -> String -> ParseError
errorContexts :: ParseError -> [String]
errorMessage :: ParseError -> String

-- | Convert an Attoparsec <a>Parser</a> into an <a>Iteratee</a>. The
--   parser will be streamed characters until it returns <a>Done</a> or
--   <a>Fail</a>.
--   
--   If parsing fails, the iteratee's error value will contain a
--   <a>ParseError</a>.
iterParser :: Monad m => Parser a -> Iteratee Text m a
instance Typeable ParseError
instance Show ParseError
instance Exception ParseError
